degree: 量化风控与金融 研究生
courses: 主修课程：创业融资、公司金融、财报估值、资产管理、量化风控与法规、量化证券分析、可持续金融与影响力投资
courses_en: Course: Entrepreneurship finance, Corporate finance, Financial reporting, Portfolio management, Quantitative risk management and regulation of risk, Quantitative security analysis, Sustainable finance and impact investing

description: GPA 3.9/4.0 | 专业前三 | 荣誉学院 | 学生会干事
description_en: GPA 3.9/4.0 | Top 1% | Honours College member | Student Union
courses: 主修课程：国际金融、市场营销、衍生品、固定收益、奇异期权、计量经济、线性代数、统计与数据分析、编程、银行学、会计学、管理学、宏/微观经济学等
courses_en: Major course: International finance, Marketing, Derivatives, Fixed income securities, Exotic options and structured products, Econometrics, Linear algebra, Statistics and data analysis, Programming, Banking, Accounting, Business management, Macro/micro-economy, etc.

description: 全球化视野 | 自我驱动 | 高阶量化
courses: 课程：高等微积分、深度学习、机器学习
